search.query: | tstats count from datamodel=Web groupby sourcetype Web.http_user_agent Web.uri_path host Web.src ```web.site``` | where sourcetype="access_combined" |rename Web.* AS * , src AS clientip

input.label: Exclude Heavy Hitters

choice.value: like to from if our would about the version khtml os iphone ApplewebKit Chrome Mobile Mac Gecko Mozilla Safari compatible windows firefox cpu NT Macintosh Build win android com htm Tinux bingbot unknown intel www bing http ipad

input.initialValue: like to from if our would about the version khtml os iphone ApplewebKit Chrome Mobile Mac Gecko Mozilla Safari compatible windows firefox cpu NT Macintosh Build win android com htm Tinux bingbot unknown intel www bing http ipad

details.ul: This presents unique words used in user agent strings. (>2 characters long).
You can search for individual words using the search above. You can filter by clicking on a word below.

In the resulting drilldown you will find all the source IPs that had presented that user agent string, clicking one of those will present another drilldown that shows all the different user agent strings presented by that particular IP address.

There are a number of words that are pre-excluded above. These are ones that I just find annoying and prolific. Also the entire "Expance, a Palo Alto ... " user agent string is hard coded out. Edit the underlying query if you want to include that back in.

table.title: Unique Words in User Agent Strings from Web Data Model.

search.query: |streamstats count |eval sets = count % 5 |eval justwords_{sets} = justwords |stats values(justwords_*) as justwords_* |rename justwords_0 as justwords, justwords_1 as "justwords ", justwords_2 as "justwords ", justwords_3 as "justwords ", justwords_4 as "justwords "

| eval justwords=http_user_agent
|where NOT match(http_user_agent,"Expanse") ```this is the paloalto UA string - very long and way too many words. this is a perm exclude jpc 13 Nov 24``` | rex mode=sed field=justwords "s/[\W|\d|_]+/ /g" | makemv justwords delim=" " | mvexpand justwords | search http_user_agent=*** | search http_user_agent=*$jwsel$* $nopers$ | stats dc(http_user_agent) AS Unq_userAgents dc(uri_path) as uri dc(host) as hosts dc(clientip) as clientips count by justwords | eval jwlen=len(justwords) | where jwlen>2
| search http_user_agent=*$w2ym$* | lookup dnslookup clientip | table _time clientip clienthost host site uri_path http_method http_user_agent http_user_agent_length 1p_owner domain
| search clientip=$curious_ip$ | table _time clientip ip_owner domain host site uri_path http_method http_user_agent http_user_agent_length ip_owner domain
